item.title: Adventures with Pentesting
item.description: Learning by doing with Hack The Box (HTB) During those locked down times I’ve been starting to play with Hack The Box, an online platform allowing to do Penetration Testing, using a lab of Virtual Machines designed for this. It’s some kind of gamified hacking: you have a profile, you earn points and you can level up. At HTB I’m gwarf. It’s a great way of starting to learn pentesting without causing troubles and in a legit environment.
